task.title: Add a new heading
task.shortdesc: When you are working in topics other than task, you may want to add a subheading to separate your sections.

context.p: You can only add one level of headings in any topic. Remember that topics are intended to be short and focussed.
The heading button works like a toggle, allowing you to both apply and remove the formatting for a heading.

step.cmd: In your topic, press Enter to put your cursor on a new, blank line.
step.info: If you are in a list, de-select the list icon from the toolbar.

step.cmd: From the toolbar, select Section Heading.
step.stepresult: Your text becomes a heading and displays in the Guidance panel.

step.cmd: Press Enter and add text, a list, a graphic, or a table after your new heading.
